name: Zagaran Software
tagline: If you can dream it, we can build it.
description:
Zagaran, Inc. is a Boston-based software consulting and development company. Over the past 5 years, we have proudly served the needs of the Greater Boston community, working on high-impact projects for over 50 diverse organizations, including venerable universities, hospitals, research groups, nonprofits, private companies, and government agencies. Our company philosophy is very simple: We choose to do right by our clients.
We stand by our software, we stand by our clients, and we stand by our community. Clients trust us to build technology critical to their mission, and we always deliver. We are focused on providing the best service and the best results to our community.
Choosing the right software developer is one of the most important decisions you can make. It’s crucial to have software experts who will choose the best tools for the job, who understand the trade-offs involved in development, who are experienced enough to make the right calls, and who know how to guide you through each step of the software development process. We are those experts for dozens of groups. We would like to be those experts for you as well.
Check us out at: www.zagaran.com
